decision_conditions:
The applicant is informed that for the avoidance of doubt the details approved by this notice are as follows:- 

Acoustic assessment 104521 issue 1. 

Queens Road parking strategy. Queens Road refuse strategy. 

Greencap energy PV handover pack.
Fisher Tomlin & Bowyer 'landscape management and aftercare plan'/ 'soft landscape specification' / 'tree planting detail' / 'tree proposal'.

External lighting
Waterstones external lighting drawing D2502-WSD-01-GF-DR-E-6305 C1. 

Privacy screening
Briggs & Sanger drawings 1329/300/03/E and 1329/400/03/A.

Cycle parking
Briggs & Sanger drawing 1329/400/18. (All Received 05/2025)

Landscape drawing 1329/100/12/A which indicates tree location and types etc.

PV panel images taken insitu on flat roof.
Bollard images taken insitu. (Received 07/07/2025)

application_details.lead_developer_company_name: LBRuT Non-Comm Env Health Noise Issues

application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to conditions U0103991 - Residential dwellings - noise protection, U0103992 - Tree planting scheme, U0103994 - ECV/Car parking management plan, U0103995 - Delivery, servicing and operational waste, U0103997 - Details of PV panels, U0103998 - Privacy screens, U0103999 - Cycle parking, and DV28 - External illumination, of planning permission 19/2404/FUL.
